Stranato: Okay, we're fighting the Neo Decepticons then.

Train Wreck did t=
he transformation thing where his door opened and he set his passengers on =
the ground.

Airbomber: This isn't good, why do I got to fight another figh=
t?

Stranato: Stop complaining, I'm having a good time and so are your team=
.

Stranato turns to the Chosen Mafia.

Stranato: You think you'll be welco=
me helping out the Maximals?

Deemos: I suppose so. I think we owe you Radi=
cons for not deciding to fire upon yes and instead operate as a team in our=
 attacks.

Stranato: Alright.

Deemos: Okay, Sharpedge, McGowan, the rest o=
f you.

Holocaust: I had them.

Deemos: You can still get someone.

Holocau=
st: Who?

Deemos: Them.

He points and Holocaust slowly nods quizzically.

=
Deemos: We're helping out the Maximals, this time...

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monda=
y, July 16, 2001 9:36 AM
  Subject: Kill Hot Rod day


  OOC: I know soulst=
ice. I didn't notice untill later though.

  ::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior=
/Blyer/Firearm::

  He heard the sound of a missile, and looked up. He was =
the bombarded
  with laser shots.
  "Scatter!" He jumped out of the way as =
the missile hit.
  He then shot two missiles at Unitron, and four laser sho=
ts at Shockwave.
  He then opened a comm.
  "Cleder, those NDE bots are att=
acking me!"

  Cleder got the message and opened a comm to Iron Raptor.
  "=
New development, Commander. Shockwave and Unitron of the NDE are
  attackin=
g Hot Rod. We are going to go help."
  He then opened a comm to the Radicon=
s inside Trainwreck.
  "The NDE is attacking Hot Rod. Will you help? This g=
oes for you Chosen
  Mafia guys too. I know you dont like the NDE."

  Cled=
er, Rixer, Forrior, Blyer, and Firearm turn around and head back
  towards =
Hot Rod, and the Chiviton base.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subjec=
t to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
